txt.en: 'We must return to Tinnudir, [placeholder]. I fear that Amarthiel has won this hour. We must plan our next move, and quickly, so her victory will be short-lived!'
Instance: Amarthiel's Hope
'One of you deal with them. We cannot afford to waste more time with them. We align the palantír.'
'[placeholder], you have survived! Worry brought me hither, and I feared what I might find.'
Speak with the Ranger protector before you search for Amarthiel.
Find Amarthiel and discover her plans.
You must defeat the Black Númenórean.
'Victory is ours! Amarthiel will not see many more days!'
Balhest
Agarochir
Talk to the Ranger protector standing before you
'It will be done, Lady Amarthiel.'
Dolvaethor
Find and stop Amarthiel
Guldurchir
Mordrambor
'Why does this foolish [placeholder] continue to plague me? We must enter Annúminas now!'
'Welcome to Evendim, [placeholder]!'
'Annúminas was once the shining jewel of the North Kingdom.'
'From within its high walls, the kings of Men kept watch over their lands.'
'Gone, gone, all gone now: the kings, the palantír they used, the people they protected.'
'But fear not, [placeholder], and my Dúnedain friends!'
Calenglad has asked you to find Amarthiel and discover her plans. He has sent you to Annúminas with five Rangers to help fight off the Angmarim.
'For I have brought a palantír to Annúminas, and I will use it to look over my lands, as did the kings of old.'
'Come, my loyal servants, my Black Númenóreans. There is much to be done within my new city.'
'Victory is ours, [placeholder]!'
'That which was hidden from me will be found, and all shall look upon Amarthiel and despair!'
'Deal with them, Morguldur. I tire of their intrusion.'
'Let us proceed... watch for the foe.'
'The city will be ours, my loyal servants.'
'None can hope to stand against us.'
'All of my servants shall be rewarded.'
'Hurry, they were ready for us. We must push through if we are to find Amarthiel before it is too late! Follow us!'
'The Great Eye will be pleased by our victories!'
